plugins.userTrackingPermission: Your app wants to track you to collect IDFA to deliver personalised ads.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Your App uses the camera to capture and upload user profile image and Listing Image to the server.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Your App needs access to the photo library to select and upload user profile image and Listing Image to the server.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Your App needs access to the photo library to select and upload user profile image and Listing Image to the server.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Your App usages device location on listing information, Listing search Data and User information.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Your App usages device location on listing information, Listing search Data and User information.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Your App uses device location on listing information, Listing search Data and User information.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Your App uses your microphone while taking video of your property for uploading in listing information.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Your app wants to track you to collect IDFA to deliver personalised ads.
